title: Don't wait in line, get your iPhone 16 delivered in minutes
description: Starting today, you can order the iPhone 16 on quick-commerce platforms like Blinkit and BB Now for delivery within minutes. Blinkit has partnered with Unicorn Stores to offer this service in Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Pune, and Bengaluru. The base variant of the iPhone 16 is priced at Rs 79,900.
content: You don't have to wait in line to buy an iPhone anymore. Starting today, order it on quick-commerce platforms like Blinkit and BB Now it will be delivered to your doorstep within minutes.
cleaned_content: you dont have to wait in line to buy an iphone anymore starting today order it on quick commerce platforms like blinkit and bb now it will be delivered to your doorstep within minutes
